dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: What brings you to this land?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: Ah, a brave adventurer! I have been expecting you. The dark sorcerer has stolen our kingdom's treasure and imprisoned the king.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Where can I find this dark sorcerer?

dialogues.speaker: NPC
dialogues.text: The dark sorcerer resides in a foreboding castle to the north. But be warned, it is said that his minions roam the land and will not hesitate to attack any who dare approach.
